title: A poem on St. Thomas Mount
content:
The news features a poem.
*   The poem's subject matter or setting is St. Thomas Mount.
*   St. Thomas Mount is a significant historical and religious landmark, particularly in Chennai, India, associated with Saint Thomas the Apostle.

title: Draft DAP aims to align defence acquisition with rapidly evolving geo-strategic landscape: Government
content:
The government has introduced a Draft Defence Acquisition Procedure (DAP).
*   Its primary goal is to align defence acquisition practices.
*   This alignment is crucial due to the rapidly evolving global geo-strategic landscape.

title: Chambal aqueduct set to facilitate water supply from river link project in Rajasthan
content:
Here's the summary in 3 bullet points:

*   The Chambal aqueduct is set to facilitate water supply.
*   This supply will be sourced from a wider river link project.
*   The entire initiative is located in Rajasthan.

title: CM Naidu seeks Central support for irrigation and infrastructure projects in A.P.
content:
Andhra Pradesh Chief Minister Naidu has sought support from the Central government.
*   This support is specifically requested for irrigation and infrastructure development projects.
*   The projects are planned within the state of Andhra Pradesh.

title: Villagers in Odisha boycott anganwadi over appointment of Dalit employee
content:
Villagers in Odisha are boycotting local anganwadi centers.
*   The boycott is in protest of the appointment of a Dalit employee.
*   The situation highlights ongoing issues of caste-based discrimination and social tensions in the region.

title: Wajid Ali Shah was not exiled to Calcutta, he came on his own, says book by descendant
content:
A new book by a descendant of Wajid Ali Shah claims he was not exiled to Calcutta.
*   The book asserts that the last Nawab of Oudh traveled to Calcutta of his own free will.
*   This challenges the widely held historical belief that his presence in Calcutta was due to forced exile.

title: A tug of war over claiming credit
content:
Multiple parties are in contention or conflict.
*   The dispute revolves around who deserves recognition or praise for an achievement.
*   Different groups are actively trying to claim sole credit for a particular outcome.

title: Vidhana Soudha group D employee arrested for stealing visitor’s bag with gold, cash from Minister’s office
content:
Here are 3 bullet points summarizing the headline:

*   A Group D employee of Vidhana Soudha has been arrested.
*   The arrest follows the theft of a visitor's bag from a Minister's office.
*   The stolen bag contained valuable items, including gold and cash.

title: T.N. likely to become $150 billion electronics hub by 2030, says State Industries Minister T.R.B. Rajaa
content:
Here's the summary in 3 bullet points:

*   Tamil Nadu (T.N.) is projected to become a **$150 billion electronics hub.**
*   This significant development is anticipated **by the year 2030.**
*   The statement was made by **State Industries Minister T.R.B. Rajaa.**

title: Kerala launches ‘Rakshakavacham’ accident insurance scheme for private sector workers
content:
Here are 3 bullet points summarizing the headline:

*   Kerala has launched a new scheme named ‘Rakshakavacham’.
*   It is an accident insurance scheme.
*   The scheme is specifically designed for private sector workers.
